Posts.Content: tr123 wrote: hi, I am 34yrs old and just got diagnosed. I live in Alpharetta area. Can some one please recommend a surgeon who does DIEP in Atlanta area regularly? I have 2 little ones at home and can not travel too far. I spoke to Dr. Amerson at BCS and she recommend mastectomy (right). Dx 2/10/2014, IDC, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 3/19/2014 Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel; Mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (right): DIEP flap Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Diep in atlanta area tr123 marley2
